pageContext.claim: “According to the Center for Immigration Studies, the $18 billion wall will pay for itself by curbing the importation of crime, drugs and illegal immigrants who tend to go on the federal dole.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump quoted from a Fox News story that cited a 2017 study. But It’s an estimate of an estimate of an estimate, which falls short if any of the variables change. Even if one accepts the numbers, it still does not cover the expected cost of the wall in 10 years.
